channel.title: Commentaires sur : Yanick Lahens
channel.description: Pour valoriser la littérature et la culture du monde insulaire francophone

item.title: Par : When Beale Street Spoke in Haiti: From Port-au-Prince to the Oscars - The Devil's Tale
item.dc:creator: When Beale Street Spoke in Haiti: From Port-au-Prince to the Oscars - The Devil's Tale
item.description: […] days after the passing of James Baldwin, on December 28, 1987, Haitian writers Jan J. Dominique and Yanick Lahens and their cohost, bookseller Monique Lafontant, paid homage to the African American writer with a […]
